metadata.synopsis: A bandit who is part of a crew looting an abandoned chapel - at this point, he's seen the players entering the chapel - 'the uninvited guests' - and thinks they're after the same loot as his crew. He's calling his friends to help.

0.speaker: Andorn
0.context: NodeContext: He's in an abandoned chapel, looting, and has just spotted the players. He calls to his friends for help and enters combat
